cinnamon.engine.utils

Class Matrix4

  • java.lang.Object
    • cinnamon.engine.utils.Matrix4
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copier<Matrix4>

    public final class Matrix4
extends Object
implements Copier<Matrix4>

    Matrix of 4x4 floats intended for transformation matrix computations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Matrix4()
      Constructs a Matrix4 whose values are all 0.
      Matrix4(float[] values)
      Constructs a Matrix4 with the first 16 values of the given array.
      Matrix4(Matrix4 matrix)
      Constructs a Matrix4 with the same values as another.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Matrix4

        public Matrix4()

        Constructs a Matrix4 whose values are all 0.

      • Matrix4

        public Matrix4(float[] values)

        Constructs a Matrix4 with the first 16 values of the given array. The array's values are read as row-major ordering.

        Parameters:
        values - source.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if values is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if values' length is < 16.

      • Matrix4

        public Matrix4(Matrix4 matrix)

        Constructs a Matrix4 with the same values as another.

        Parameters:
        matrix - to copy.

      • get

        public float[] get(float[] values,
                   int offset)

        Copies all floats to the given array with the specified offset.

        Parameters:
        values - to hold values.
        offset - starting index into given array.
        Returns:
        values.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if values is null;
        IllegalArgumentException - if values' is length is < 16 or there isn't enough space in the array with the given offset.

      • get

        Copies all floats to the given buffer.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        buffer.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if buffer is null.
        BufferOverflowException - if the buffer does not have enough space.
        ReadOnlyBufferException - if the buffer cannot be written to.

        row - row index.
        Returns:
        value at indices.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if column or row is < 0, or if column or row is >= 4.

      • multiply

        public Point multiply(Point point)

        Multiplies the matrix with the given point. The point is treated as a 4-vector whose 4th component is 0.

        This operation treats the specified vector as a column vector and should be read as matrix * point .

        Parameters:
        point - point.
        Returns:
        point.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if point is null.

      • multiply

        public Vector multiply(Vector vector)

        Multiplies the matrix with the given vector. The vector is treated as a 4-vector whose 4th component is 0.

        This operation treats the specified vector as a column vector and should be read as matrix * vector .

        Parameters:
        vector - vector.
        Returns:
        vector.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if vector is null.

      • set

        public void set(float[] values)

        Sets all values to those of the first 16 in the given array. The array's values are read as row-major ordering.

        Parameters:
        values - values.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if values is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if values' length is < 16.

      • set

        public void set(int column,
                int row,
                float value)

        Sets the value at the given column and row indices.

        Parameters:
        column - column index.
        row - row index.
        value - value.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if column or row is < 0, or if column or row is >= 4.
